name: Spectral camping
description:
Spectral campers is a scoring game where Sylvan, a hicker that had plan to spend the night in the woods gets attacked by ghosts of the previous campers to sleep here.

Help Sylvan to resist against those cursed ghosts !

How to play:

  • Left click where you want Sylvan to go
  • Hold right click to charge and release to throw a tent

Powerups:


The star make you invincible for 3 seconds. Go for it!


This item invert your attraction and make the ghosts flee from you. Great to get a short break!

This is an advanced armor that will protect you from one ghost. Be carefull, it will break once it is used.


This item temporarily boosts your speed. Gotta go fast!


With those shoes, you will run slightly faster. And they last forever.

Share your best score in the comments !
(Mine is 2:41:85)

Game made by Ardos for the 5th Potat0sJam
